text: Realized I could just use HubDb-table name instead of an ID, so that works :blush:

I was curious if there is a way to manage url redirects on the search bar based on keywords? My client has their products on Shopify and the other pages of their website is hosted on HubSpot. I know there's no cross platform compatibility between the two with searchbar functionality but, say if someone types the product name - based on keyword, can I create a redirect to the Shopify url? Can't seem to find a doc or post anywhere on that..

ie. 'iPhone' > redirect to iPhone products on Shopify url
You could have hidden pages for these urls, and have those pages redirect to the products
Mindblown.... That is an idea I can tinker around with
of course, let me know how it goes
